decision_conditions: Prior to the commencement of any development, excluding works of demolition and site preparation, full details (including Plans and photographs) of the facing materials (specification and RAL colour) to be utilised in the development to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The application seeks to amended Condition 3 of Planning 21/00068/FUL as belowCondition 3 (original)Prior to the commencement of any development, excluding works of demolition and site preparation, samples of the facing materials to be utilised in the development to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved samples.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.Condition 3 (Proposed amendment)Prior to the commencement of any development, excluding works of demolition and site preparation, details of the facing materials to be utilised in the development to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.Officers consdier that the proposed amendment would be non-material subject to the additional condition listed
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/00068/FUL (Change of use of first floor from Class E (offices) to Class C3 (dwellings) together with the erection of extensions and alterations to provide 3no. 1 bed and 3no. 2 bed self-contained flats) dated 14/05/2021. Amendment to consist of change of wording within Condition 3 to state: "Prior to the commencement of any development, excluding works of demolition and site preparation, details of the facing materials to be utilised in the development to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved details."
